amendment.description: Amendment requires that any new vessel constructed for the Coast Guard with amounts made available under this Act (1) shall be constructed in the United States; (2) shall not be constructed of steel or iron produced outside of the United States; and (3) shall be constructed in compliance with the Buy American Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section providing that only American made vessels shall be constructed.

action.text: Traficant amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
